alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 5:51PM MST until November 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Arches/Grand Flat and Canyonlands/Natural Bridges. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Canyonlands, Natural Bridges
